information: The company SOREMET (SOC REVETEMENTS METALLURGIQUES), is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 2002, which operates in the Steel industry. It also operates in the Iron, special grade and pig iron, Coating - steel and metals, and metrology industries. It is based in Margival, France.
